# Role Onboarding Template

Welcome to your new role! This template will guide you through your first week and help you get up to speed.

---

## Role Information
**Role Title:** _[Your role name]_  
**Start Date:** _[Date]_  
**Manager/Lead:** _[Name and contact]_  
**Onboarding Buddy:** _[Name and contact]_

---

## Initial Contacts

### Key Team Members
- **Manager:** _[Name, email, Slack/Teams handle]_
- **Team Lead:** _[Name, email, Slack/Teams handle]_
- **Onboarding Buddy:** _[Name, email, Slack/Teams handle]_
- **Peer in Similar Role:** _[Name, email, Slack/Teams handle]_

### Key Stakeholders
- _[Stakeholder 1: Name, role, contact]_
- _[Stakeholder 2: Name, role, contact]_
- _[Stakeholder 3: Name, role, contact]_

---

## Required Accesses

### Systems and Tools
- [ ] Email and calendar access
- [ ] Project management tools (e.g., Jira, Azure DevOps, GitHub Projects)
- [ ] Communication platforms (e.g., Slack, Microsoft Teams)
- [ ] Version control (e.g., GitHub, GitLab)
- [ ] Documentation repository (e.g., Confluence, SharePoint, Wiki)
- [ ] CI/CD pipelines and monitoring tools
- [ ] _[Add role-specific tools]_

### Permissions and Access Levels
- [ ] Repository access (read/write as appropriate)
- [ ] Build and deployment permissions
- [ ] Production system access (if applicable)
- [ ] _[Add role-specific permissions]_

---

## First Week Tasks

### Day 1
- [ ] Introduction meeting with manager
- [ ] Meet your onboarding buddy
- [ ] Complete IT setup and verify all system accesses
- [ ] Review organization chart and team structure
- [ ] Join relevant communication channels

### Day 2-3
- [ ] Read key documentation (see Documentation to Read section below)
- [ ] Shadow a team meeting or ceremony
- [ ] Review current project status and priorities
- [ ] Set up 1:1 meetings with key stakeholders

### Day 4-5
- [ ] Participate in team standup or sync meeting
- [ ] Review backlog and current sprint/iteration
- [ ] Start working on a small, well-defined task
- [ ] Ask questions and clarify any unknowns

---

## Meetings to Schedule

### Recurring Meetings
- [ ] Daily standup / team sync (_[Time, frequency]_)
- [ ] Sprint planning / iteration planning (_[Time, frequency]_)
- [ ] Retrospective (_[Time, frequency]_)
- [ ] 1:1 with manager (_[Time, frequency]_)
- [ ] _[Add role-specific recurring meetings]_

### Initial One-time Meetings
- [ ] Kick-off meeting with manager
- [ ] Introduction to stakeholders
- [ ] Project overview session
- [ ] Tool and process training
- [ ] _[Add role-specific meetings]_

---

## Documentation to Read

### Essential Reading (Week 1)
- [ ] Team mission and goals
- [ ] Current project overview and roadmap
- [ ] Role responsibilities and expectations
- [ ] Team workflows and processes
- [ ] Definition of Done and quality standards
- [ ] _[Add role-specific documentation]_

### Important Reading (Week 2-4)
- [ ] Architecture and design documentation
- [ ] Historical context and decision logs
- [ ] Risk register and mitigation strategies
- [ ] Past retrospective notes and action items
- [ ] _[Add role-specific documentation]_

---

## Success Indicators

### End of Week 1
- [ ] All system accesses configured
- [ ] Met all key team members and stakeholders
- [ ] Familiar with current projects and priorities
- [ ] Attended at least one team meeting

### End of Month 1
- [ ] Completed first meaningful task or contribution
- [ ] Actively participating in team ceremonies
- [ ] Understand team processes and workflows
- [ ] Building relationships with stakeholders
